page.title: 06LIVING IN BISHOPS WALTHAM
page.content: I quite like living in Bishops Waltham as there is a lot of open spaces around. I also like it because I live in a nice house with a fair sized garden. The houses where I live are old - about 83 years old - so there is plenty of space around. However five of the fields have been built on with small houses and now there is a lot of traffic. I would like to see less people in the area so that housing and unemploy- ment would go down. The population is now around 4000. I would like this figure to be about 1500. Near my house there is a very straight Roman road called{Tangier {Lane.}The pond is quite interesting and if you are a keen fisherman it is just the place for you.
